DataSource.query:
select
distinct 
case
  when substr(vvs,1,2)='21'
  then 'A_SF_ALT' 
  when substr(vvs,1,2) in ('55','56','57')
  then 'A_IF_ALT'
  else 'A_REST'
end VVS,

'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA'),
'N'

from dtl_br_vertrag
where
monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)
UNION 
SELECT DISTINCT
case
  when substr(vvs,1,2)='21'
  then 'A_SF_ALT' 
  when substr(vvs,1,2) in ('55','56','57')
  then 'A_IF_ALT'
  else 'A_REST'
end ,
 'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA'),
'N'
FROM dtl_br_kunden_man_rest
WHERE monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT 
case
  when substr(vvs,1,2)='21'
  then 'A_SF_ALT' 
  when substr(vvs,1,2) in ('55','56','57')
  then 'A_IF_ALT'
  else 'A_REST'
end ,
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
,'N'
FROM dtl_br_provisionen_rest
WHERE monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)
AND kd_nr IS NOT NULL
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT
case
  when substr(kostenstelle,1,2)='21'
  then 'A_SF_ALT' 
  when substr(kostenstelle,1,2) in ('55','56','57')
  then 'A_IF_ALT'
  else 'A_REST'
end ,
 'A_'||kostenstelle,
'N'
FROM dtl_br_provisionen_rest
WHERE monatsscheibe=(select monatsscheibe from pv_parameter)
AND kd_nr IS  NULL
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT 
case
  when substr(vvs,1,2)='21'
  then 'A_SF_ALT' 
  when substr(vvs,1,2) in ('55','56','57')
  then 'A_IF_ALT'
  else 'A_REST'
end ,
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
,'N'
FROM dtl_vr_auszahlungen a
WHERE stichtag=(select last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter)
and (nvl(a.buergschaften,0)+nvl(a.programmkredite,0)+nvl(a.disagio,0)+nvl(a.gebuehren_provisionen,0)+nvl(a.globaldarlehen,0)+
nvl(a.liquiditaetwirksame_auszahlung,0)) <> 0
ORDER BY 2
